Sentencas: A combined power generation system is proposed based on SOFC/GT and transcritical carbon dioxide cycle, which employs the transcritical carbon dioxide cycle to recover the waste heat from SOFC/GT.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of combined power generation system based on SOFC/GT and transcritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The proposed system performance is evaluated by mathematical models and thermodynamic laws.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of combined power generation system based on SOFC/GT and transcritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: Results indicate that the SOFC, TRCC and overall system electrical efficiencies are 49.21%, 29.14% and 69.26% under the designed conditions, and the last increases with increase in compressor pressure ratio.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of combined power generation system based on SOFC/GT and transcritical carbon dioxide cycle

Sentencas: The entrance pressures of expansion machine in TRCC also affect the performance of the combined power generation system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of combined power generation system based on SOFC/GT and transcritical carbon dioxide cycle
